In that light, new knowledge begets heavy tasks, for to whom more is given, more is required. Hence , participants are expected to reign in their various domains after attending such a conference.\
\
And as Emma gospel (the host) puts it, the conference was aimed at elevating worshipers into their predestined heights of glory.[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CvLxkvFzZ8o/XiVmfmoBAeI/AAAAAAAA8NE/iC5sR1s6aZU4MVazuUos3IPaN6bQrm3ZgCLcBGAsYHQ/s320/IMG-20200115-WA0049.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CvLxkvFzZ8o/XiVmfmoBAeI/AAAAAAAA8NE/iC5sR1s6aZU4MVazuUos3IPaN6bQrm3ZgCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG-20200115-WA0049.jpg)

As Cameroonian gospel artists, Christian acts , worshipers (dancers, writers, bloggers, spoken word artists, comedians , entertainers, athletes, workers, business guru's etc) have come a long way , but we are yet to meet our aspiring results .

\
So the conference brought together teachers and every other person to help identify our problem and teach on a plethora of solutions.\
\
Topics taught include; branding as a gospel minister , maintaining focus in minister , purpose / vision, honor, spirituality , relationship , running a musical band, voice training , ministration guides etc.\
\
In tidbits,\
\
Rev Etta gave the

**difference between gospel and Christian music .***\
Gospel music : any song with ethical lyrics*

[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8KlTp0H2a-E/XiVm6bslOrI/AAAAAAAA8Nc/B0_2AuOljWI0eQkIeIrP2k2AiYPQxx9FQCLcBGAsYHQ/s320/IMG-20200115-WA0053.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8KlTp0H2a-E/XiVm6bslOrI/AAAAAAAA8Nc/B0_2AuOljWI0eQkIeIrP2k2AiYPQxx9FQCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG-20200115-WA0053.jpg)*\
Christian music : Christ centered music , it's written about him and sung to him, it must carry Jesus name and the beliefs of Jesus .*\
Rev Gabiga taught on**Purpose**and he said :[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oTkY6nGZwYE/XiVnaqOLSAI/AAAAAAAA8N0/nzzZJyxuCT88z2yU9iy5273oP1d1xvVOACLcBGAsYHQ/s320/IMG-20200116-WA0012.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oTkY6nGZwYE/XiVnaqOLSAI/AAAAAAAA8N0/nzzZJyxuCT88z2yU9iy5273oP1d1xvVOACLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG-20200116-WA0012.jpg)

*Purpose is not what you were born to be; rather it is what you do with what\
you become that is purpose fulfillment.**\
Pilate was born to save a king but he\
cowardly backed off.**\
Great heights are not attained and maintained by being passionate about the\
vision but being passionate about the purpose.**\
When vision become stronger than purpose, ambition is born*\
\
Brian Aboringong on song writing\
**The anatomy of a song (Song Structure)**

[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-l2Yn7zwTWOI/XiV060E7KGI/AAAAAAAA8P8/qG8XygHbQR4OSll1DyYLTatPQQnEkujVwCLcBGAsYHQ/s320/IMG_0620.CR2)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-l2Yn7zwTWOI/XiV060E7KGI/AAAAAAAA8P8/qG8XygHbQR4OSll1DyYLTatPQQnEkujVwCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG_0620.CR2)

*Knowledge of the various parts of a song and their functions greatly helps in writing your own song.*\
*\
There are several parts to a song, although every song must not contain ALL these elements.*\
*\
The Verse\
The Chorus\
The Bridge\
The Hook\
Most songs sung today will have one of several structures\
The Chorus-Only format\
The Verse Only Format\
The Verse and Chorus format\
The Verse-Chorus-Verse-Chorus format\
The Verse-Chorus-Verse-Chorus-Bridge*\
Etc...\
\
[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ChzNS8k8C2I/XiVnCT-5G9I/AAAAAAAA8Ng/f03CVyVpIUcQmbLSfCeXcMG9CP1bvEj7gCLcBGAsYHQ/s200/IMG-20200115-WA0033.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ChzNS8k8C2I/XiVnCT-5G9I/AAAAAAAA8Ng/f03CVyVpIUcQmbLSfCeXcMG9CP1bvEj7gCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG-20200115-WA0033.jpg)[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WRt5Y4pJUCY/XiVnNcg5ZVI/AAAAAAAA8No/Wbcrgdv21Z4rz2Y0WHAyV1Qt_K2XSvt9QCLcBGAsYHQ/s200/IMG-20200116-WA0015.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WRt5Y4pJUCY/XiVnNcg5ZVI/AAAAAAAA8No/Wbcrgdv21Z4rz2Y0WHAyV1Qt_K2XSvt9QCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG-20200116-WA0015.jpg)\
\
The teachings were mind blowing and it enthralled the audience, as everyone apparently went home satisfied and impacted.

[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9hYAba0Id7Q/XiVoFnf52jI/AAAAAAAA8OE/aq8IQtn9nzoijFTVxkK_YeTVRzGXpZ4AgCLcBGAsYHQ/s320/IMG_9941.CR2)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9hYAba0Id7Q/XiVoFnf52jI/AAAAAAAA8OE/aq8IQtn9nzoijFTVxkK_YeTVRzGXpZ4AgCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG_9941.CR2)\
\
And oh, there was an explosive all night concert. Tagged : Spirit to Spirit\
\
The songs were very original and creative. The ministers exposed their very original shade, as most of them sang their own songs and that of their pals.

[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sIcMCC5GBMw/XiVpCOLULGI/AAAAAAAA8OY/yi2Cew9D-okpuORQZmopvvZHCVldwV9SQCLcBGAsYHQ/s200/IMG_0525.JPG)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sIcMCC5GBMw/XiVpCOLULGI/AAAAAAAA8OY/yi2Cew9D-okpuORQZmopvvZHCVldwV9SQCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG_0525.JPG)[](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JZtJpTWWDTU/XiVpu_GZE3I/AAAAAAAA8Ok/OqDrarroo5oWLCjzdTYmGx92oaxTTfFVACLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG_0650.CR2)[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tWh0dvs4ins/XiVpfNz3mII/AAAAAAAA8Og/MmDsP9YsxU4dpHX9ec-ZqqyR_yUo0iVNACLcBGAsYHQ/s200/IMG_9949.JPG)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tWh0dvs4ins/XiVpfNz3mII/AAAAAAAA8Og/MmDsP9YsxU4dpHX9ec-ZqqyR_yUo0iVNACLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG_9949.JPG)![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JZtJpTWWDTU/XiVpu_GZE3I/AAAAAAAA8Ok/OqDrarroo5oWLCjzdTYmGx92oaxTTfFVACLcBGAsYHQ/s200/IMG_0650.CR2)[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XHstyMV1A1U/XiVqiBgfBhI/AAAAAAAA8O0/APlqSjP6eggTWPPDkbggCC4j02aY8w5lQCLcBGAsYHQ/s200/IMG_0502.JPG)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XHstyMV1A1U/XiVqiBgfBhI/AAAAAAAA8O0/APlqSjP6eggTWPPDkbggCC4j02aY8w5lQCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG_0502.JPG)[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fXZyO16jdc4/XiVqfOAhgYI/AAAAAAAA8Ow/M3LgWN1nVYsyosALghOeQkRL9YWbQSBnACLcBGAsYHQ/s200/IMG_0575.JPG)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fXZyO16jdc4/XiVqfOAhgYI/AAAAAAAA8Ow/M3LgWN1nVYsyosALghOeQkRL9YWbQSBnACLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG_0575.JPG)[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hBkxx8VEL8Y/XiVoumI-EbI/AAAAAAAA8OQ/JnMvLS-yksE6wGyKAxLjibxnlkSUNbxZQCLcBGAsYHQ/s200/IMG_0263.JPG)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hBkxx8VEL8Y/XiVoumI-EbI/AAAAAAAA8OQ/JnMvLS-yksE6wGyKAxLjibxnlkSUNbxZQCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG_0263.JPG)

\
A sign to show, we are getting to where we are aiming at. That is, a concert where our artists didn't bring their Nigerian cousins (songs) to the event.\
\
It was pure , original and sophisticated. The worship was on another level. We experienced a shift in the atmosphere , the Holy ghost was present. The whole place was set ablaze with the glory of God.\
\
Further more, as per the organisation , MadeofGod tv was on that desk so there can hardly be any criticism (lol sigh , I don't care lol) .\
\
Nonetheless everything was superbly done, but it's okay to drop a suggestion or a critic in the comment section.\
\
Certificates were awarded for registered participants along side a designed mug .\
\
[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mojxScweRL0/XiVnRGLqk4I/AAAAAAAA8Ns/1Z4UnHadqUEE1NeqKVfc0SIcrs8jwx4rQCLcBGAsYHQ/s320/IMG-20200120-WA0011.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mojxScweRL0/XiVnRGLqk4I/AAAAAAAA8Ns/1Z4UnHadqUEE1NeqKVfc0SIcrs8jwx4rQCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG-20200120-WA0011.jpg)[![](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-o-TaUuq-t7Y/XiVmkV4QytI/AAAAAAAA8NI/MAm9jQCXCHkLNxnONMsqX-bT3u38BB22wCLcBGAsYHQ/s320/IMG-20200120-WA0015.jpg)](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-o-TaUuq-t7Y/XiVmkV4QytI/AAAAAAAA8NI/MAm9jQCXCHkLNxnONMsqX-bT3u38BB22wCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/IMG-20200120-WA0015.jpg)\
\
The Conference was tagged ; I am Totally original.\
\
Aimed to the inscribe in the hearts of worshipers that , they are unique and perfectly made to abide in their calling and walk in their own lane.\
\
No one can ever be like you, because you are God's very own masterpiece .\
\
For more pictures and videos pls visit the National Worship Leaders conference page on Facebook\
\
Or YouTube: MadeofGod tv

summary: The 15th to the 18 of January in Buea - Southwest region of Cameroon experienced a great move of God. Every worship leader, music minister or the aspiring ones definitely got adopted into the path of revival.
